channel.title: Problem to solve... URGENT
channel.description:
I have a nub problem on my server..
First comes a guy on my server and advers.. than my friends nulled his server.. and he tryed null our server and we nulled him again. but now he doenst gives up.. and asks for truce i ipbanned him and nulled his server
but now he is trying crash my server but i have backup :D
can someone help me block this conection from CPE000e0819ce0e-CM000a735d6399.cpe.net.cable.rogers.com if you know how post here. Thanks!
